meanings.definition: An error in transcribing or copying text.
meanings.sent1: The teacher noticed a mistranscription in the student's essay.
meanings.sent2: The mistranscription of the quote led to confusion in the report.
meanings.sent3: The mistranscription of the recipe made the cake taste like soap.
meanings.sent4: His mistranscription of the map took us to the wrong destination.
meanings.sent5: The mistranscription in the contract changed the entire agreement.

meanings.definition: The act of incorrectly transcribing or copying text.
meanings.sent1: She apologized for the mistranscription of the important document.
meanings.sent2: The mistranscription of the data resulted in a flawed analysis.
meanings.sent3: The mistranscription of the phone number caused a mix-up in communication.
meanings.sent4: His repeated mistranscription of the password locked him out of his account.
meanings.sent5: The mistranscription of the song lyrics made everyone laugh.
